DOC.criteria: Age 21 ( age 21 usually treat Pediatric Transplant Service ) Diagnosis multiple myeloma Scheduled receive conditioning chemotherapy follow upfront salvage autologous peripheral blood hematopoietic stem cell transplantation Absolute neutrophil count le 200/microliter Platelet count le 20,000/microliter Acupuncture treatment precede 4 week prior Day 1
